name: 2 Day Roguelike
description:
2 Day Roguelike

A simple rogue-like game developed in two work days for learning purposes.

Use WASD or arrow keys to control the player. Depending on surrounding objects, this will either move the player or interact with surrounding objects. The game is implemented in a turn based manner, i.e. enemies will take their turn after the player.

Source code access

Source code can be found on GitHub.

Attributions
  • Tilesets by kenney.nl
  • Creatures by @JoeCreates
  • Menu and Level Music by Juhani Junkala
  • Victory and Game Over Jingles from Open Game Art (no attribution info given)
